vote.title: Authorize a three-year agreement with the American Red Cross (Red Cross), the Dallas Chapter, to permit the temporary use of Park and Recreation facilities, as Red Cross public shelter during a declared or undeclared natural disaster or other condition or event requiring the activation of the disaster relief functions of the Red Cross - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
